column2: "Hom nyi EWURADZE ayɛw. Osiarfo nye nyimpa a osuro EWURADZE
column3: Na ɔwɔ enyigye pii wɔ ne mbra mu."

column2: "N'asefo bɛyɛ akatakyi wɔ asaase do: Atseneneefo mbasantsen behyira hɔn."
"Bafuu na ahonya wɔ ne fie; Na ne ndzeyɛtsenenee tsim hɔ daa."
"Kan pue sum mu ma atseneneefo: Ɔyɛ adom
"Nyimpa a ɔyɛ adom na ɔdze fɛm no
column3: osi no yie; Obegyina n'asɛm do wɔ atsɛmbu mu."

column2: "Osiandɛ orinnhim ara da; Ɔtseneneenyi no wɔbɛkaa no daa."

column4: Ekodu dɛ obohu n'apɛdze wɔ n'atamfo do."

column3: ɔdze ama ehiafo; Ne tsenenee tsim hɔ daa: Wɔdze enyidzi bɛma n'ambɛn do."
na ayɛ no yaw; Ɔbɔtwɛr ne se
